articles.title: Coronavirus cases surge in South Korea as outbreak spreads to nearly 50 countries
articles.description: More than 500 new coronavirus cases were reported in South Korea, where authorities are considering keeping schools closed for a month. The virus has spread from China to 47 countries.

articles.title: Coronavirus fears send Dow plunging nearly 1,200 points
articles.description: As the Dow experienced its worst day ever, former Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen warned of a potential recession, but said the U.S. outlook does look “pretty good.”
